```{r}

# Optionally, view the first few lines of the content
file_paths <- c("../final_first/en_US/en_US.blogs.txt", "../final_first/en_US/en_US.twitter.txt", "../final_first/en_US/en_US.news.txt")

for(f in file_paths) {
  print("Finding longest line for ")
  print(f)
  con <- file(f, "r") 
  len <- 0
  lines <- readLines(con)
  for(line in lines) {
    #print(line)
    #print(nchar(line))
    if(nchar(line)>len) len <- nchar(line)
  }
  print(len)
  close(con)
}
```
